Key Match Events: Jose Altuve hit a game-winning walk-off double in the bottom of the ninth inning
Royals third baseman Paul DeJong tied the game with a two-run homer in the top of the ninth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Joe Espada praised Jose Altuve's performance
Royals third baseman Paul DeJong commented on Framber Valdez's pitching
Miscellaneous Highlights: Framber Valdez threw seven no-hit innings
Josh Hader's consecutive saves streak was snapped at 29 games
Others: The Astros won their third game in a row
Bryan Abreu gave up a single to break up the no-hit bid in the eighth inning
